item.title: What Have I Done (this week)?
item.description:
Thursday, 08/24

  • new theme for this site
  • first post

Friday, 08/25

  • lots of fun build changes to the site (they were not fun. they were tedious.) if you want more deets on that they’re here
  • some minor color changes to goknba.how’s landing page & added a link to this site
  • Conspiracy Theory watchin’

Saturday, 08/26

  • opened ticket for reimaging of a vps (because apparently I had fucked it up so much that I couldn’t even display .php files)

Sunday, 08/27

  • still waiting for reimaging to finish

item.title: What is This?
item.description:
“Aberrant Media”? The fuck?

This is a #business where I make things.

Media things; stuff you can see or hear (or, if you live close enough, smell and taste).

And maybe feel. Like in your soul. If you have one.

Blame Cristian and Standard Media, if you want to.
